    • testIsDoneContract

      public void testIsDoneContract() throws Exception
      Test that the contract from the master for checking on a snapshot are valid.

      1. If a snapshot fails with an error, we expect to get the source error.
      2. If there is no snapshot name supplied, we should get an error.
      3. If asking about a snapshot has hasn't occurred, you should get an error.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • testGetCompletedSnapshots

    • testSnapshotHFileArchiving

      public void testSnapshotHFileArchiving() throws Exception
      Test that the snapshot hfile archive cleaner works correctly. HFiles that are in snapshots should be retained, while those that are not in a snapshot should be deleted.
      Throws:
      Exception - on failure

    • getHFiles

      private final Collection<String> getHFiles(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path dir, org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.TableName tableName) throws IOException

      Throws:
